import{createSelector}from"reselect";var selectShop=function selectShop(state){return state.shop;};export var selectShopData=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return shop.shopData;});export var selectCollectionsForPreview=createSelector([selectShopData],function(collections){return collections?Object.keys(collections).map(function(key){return collections[key];}):[];});export var selectShopCollection=function selectShopCollection(collectionUrlParams){return createSelector([selectShopData],function(collections){return collections?collections[collectionUrlParams]:null;});};export var selectIsCollectionFetching=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return shop.isFetching;});export var selectIsCollectionLoaded=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return!!shop.shopData;}//returns a boolean
);
